transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan


Store Actions
Products Markup

2 min
purpose this tab allows the admin to set the markup price for the store products the admin has the facility to select from the master markup or setup a custom markup price for the selected products set product markup for managing the markup price product wise, navigate to the store management >> stores >> select store >> action menu >> products markup you can choose from the store markup or define a custom markup price and save the changes for the products where you have applied any master markup, there will be a preview icon using which the admin can check the markup details in the pop up in addition, you can view the details of the price using the price calculator icon clicking on the icon will open the price calculator screen to check the details
Did this page help you?
